title: 403. Q&AF: Instilling Winning Qualities In Children, Free Vs. Charging Services & Approaching Content Ownership
itunes:title: 403. Q&AF: Instilling Winning Qualities In Children, Free Vs. Charging Services & Approaching Content Ownership
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on what qualities parents should instill in their children to set them up for success, if offering a free service when launching a new business is a smart strategy to get buy-in from customers, and how to approach the owners of a business who are content with the position of the company.
